content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
- Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
- Burner mining drill is connected to a wooden chest at position (43.5, -82.5)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory is present on the map

### Lab
Consists of a lab at an unknown position with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chests
- Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure the entities are close enough to be connected with pipes
- Make sure the pipe connections are valid and not obstructed by other entities

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine
- Make sure the burner mining drill is connected to a valid resource

### Errors when using boilers and steam engines
- Ensure the boiler has fuel before attempting to generate steam
- Make sure the steam engine is connected to a valid fluid system

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the tile is empty before attempting to place an entity
- Make sure the entity can be placed at the desired position
